newsitem.title: ROMANIA: ROMANIAN LEU 3,234 TO DLR FOR SEPT 24-BNR.
newsitem.headline: ROMANIAN LEU 3,234 TO DLR FOR SEPT 24-BNR.

text.p: Romania's National Bank (BNR) announced the leu's reference rate at 3,234 to the dollar for September 24.
This reference rate was set on Friday as a weighted average based on daily reports of foreign exchange operators. It is a guidance rate used for statistical accounting purposes.
The leu's reference rate set on Thursday for September 23 is 3,227 to the dollar. It was 3,227 on Friday. -- Bucharest Newsroom 40-1 3120264
